experience: You and Dallis both know Eric Keosky-Smith, Jared Vishney, and 54 others

Intercedium aims to put the power back into brick and mortar businesses. Specializing in turning existing businesses into internet superstars, we help business owners scale revenue while reducing costs. Strategic market placement enables our clients to find efficiency and profitability in crowded and unique markets. Our unique consultative approach builds solutions that bring value and relationships that last. For a free consultation on your business, reach out to us anytime at dhughes@intercedium.com.

Pixorus re-purposes the aging cellphone market by creating affordable and discreet security solutions.  Our picture frames conceal smartphones within them, allowing consumers to utilize smartphones as security cameras, unbeknownst to the casual visitor. Our customers use the software of their liking from the Apple or Android market to monitor their home or office from their current smartphone. Frames for most phones are available. For custom applications, reach out to us at pixorusframes@gmail.com
Director of Digital Sales and Marketing

Developed a recurring e-commerce revenue stream to an existing brick and mortar environment with growth from $0 to $800k/yr+ in 48 months (aiming for $900k in 2018). Currently manage products across eBay, Amazon and the Advantage Rigging website. Daily activities include customer service, order fulfillment, and focus on growth by leveraging CPM/CPA campaigns, cross promotion, SEO/social media and more. Analytics allow for a deeper understanding of customer cost of acquisition, lifetime value and sales cycle. A relentless focus on customer-centric behavior through all platforms has allowed Advantage Rigging to become one of the fastest growing online retailers within its market segment.

A continuation of prior work for Equine.com, this focus was on the small business sector post-recession. With the means to target an audience by breed, disciple and location, this position created the highest relevance for advertisers in order to create value and ROI.

As a premier e-commerce solution, Pinnacle Cart aims to put the power of today's technology into the hands of business owners. In the Business Sales realm, this meant growing a portfolio of Re-sellers, of which many white label the product as their own. This was a new position for the company, where reseller sales cycle was previously and unknown. Over $100k in reseller sales was seen in the 12 months spent in this position.

The TEM program serves to put ASU on the map as a means for the next generation of entrepreneurs. From local to international business, the program helps aspiring business owners consider how ventures meet customer needs and address pains, in order to create value that remains innovative. With a focus on Leadership, the TEM program served as a springboard into the boundless world of start-ups in today's climate.
